break-shop-use-supertool: §eVous ne pouvez détruire ce shop en utilisant le SuperTool.

console-only-danger: &cThis is a danger command so that only can be executed by Console.
shop-removed-cause-ongoing-fee: §cVotre shop en {0} a été supprimé parce que vous n'avez plus assez d'argent!
blacklisted-item: §cCet objet est dans la liste noire. Tu ne peux pas le vendre.
you-cant-afford-to-change-price: §cCela coûte {0} de changer le prix de ton shop.
forbidden-vanilla-behavior: &cThe operation is forbidden due to it not being consistent with vanilla behavior
digits-reach-the-limit: §cVeuillez indiquer au maximum 2 chiffres après la virgule dans le prix.
currency-unset: &aShop currency removed successfully. Using default settings now.
you-cant-create-shop-in-there: §cVous n'avez pas la permission de créer un shop à cet emplacement!
failed-to-paste: §cFailed upload data to Pastebin, Check the internet and try again. (See console for details)
how-many-buy-stack: §aEntrer combien de stack souhaitez vous §bACHETER§a dans le tchat. Il y a §e{0}§a objets dans chaque stack et vous pouvez acheter §e{1}§a stacks. Entrer §ball§a pour tout acheter.
exceeded-maximum: &cThe value exceeded the maximum value in Java.
no-enough-money-to-keep-shops: §cTu n'as plus d'argent pour garder tes shops.. Tous les hops sont supprimé.
3rd-plugin-build-check-failed: §c3rd party plugin §l{0}§r§c denied the permission checks, did you have permission setup in there?

denied-put-in-item: §cCet objet ne peut être ajouté à ce shop!

menu.sell-tax-self: §aCe shop t'appartient donc tu ne payes pas de taxes.

currency-not-exists: &cCannot find the currency that you want to set. Maybe the spelling is wrong or that currency isn't available in this world.

unknown-player: §cTarget player doesn't exist, please check the username you typed.
warn-to-paste: §eCollecting data and upload to Pastebin, this may need a while. §c§lWarning§c, The data is keep public one week, it may leak your server configuration, make sure you only send it to your §ltrusted staff/developer.
how-many-sell-stack: §aEnter how many bulks you wish to §dSELL§a in chat. There have §e{0}§a items in each bulk and You have §e{1}§a bulks available. Enter §ball§a to sell them all.

updatenotify.remote-disable-warning: §cThis version of QuickShop is marked disabled by remote server, that mean this version may have serious problem, get details from our SpigotMC page: {0}. This warning will appear and spam your console until you use other not disabled version to replace this one, doesn't effect your server running.
